attributes.additional_details: I want the goverment to relook at womens retirment ages for women born in 1953. I cant believe there are 3 retirment ages for 1 year rangeing from 2015 to 2019 this is a difference of 4 years for women born in the same year ,surely this cant be right I was born in december 1953 I wont now retire until 2019 1 year after my husband who was born in the same year.I have 37yrs national insurance stamps I have worked all my life I want the goverment to let all women born in 1953 retire in 2015 .
